https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mMIpr0eMn6ezO9MFFyMapR7J6L1.jpg Two cricket journalists set off on a journey to the heart of the game they love, only to stumble upon one of the biggest sporting scandals ever. This is a film about passion, greed, power - and standing up for what you care about. Death of a Gentleman
